parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the E-HPC cluster.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description:
The name of the user that runs the job.

You can call the [ListUsers](~~188572~~) operation to query the users in the cluster.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number of the page to return.

Pages start from 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return per page. Maximum value: 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Rerunable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the job can be rerun. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
The status of the job. Valid values:

*   all
*   finished
*   notfinish
